statements: UPDATE website_traffic_prediction SET predicted_traffic = 100 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE website_traffic_prediction SET page_views = 150, time_visited = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE website_traffic_prediction SET predicted_traffic = 1000 WHERE user_id = 1 AND page_views > 5;
UPDATE website_traffic_prediction SET time_visited = '2022-05-10 08:00:00', predicted_traffic = 1500 WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE website_traffic_prediction SET page_visited='Home' WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_type='login', activity_timestamp='2023-10-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id=202;
UPDATE website_traffic_prediction SET page_visited='Home Page' WHERE user_id=123
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_type='Login' WHERE user_id=456
UPDATE website_traffic_prediction SET clicks = 50, page_views = 100 WHERE user_id = 101 AND date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_type = 'logged in' WHERE user_id = 201 AND date = '2022-08-20';
UPDATE website_traffic_prediction SET page_views = 100, clicks = 20 WHERE user_id = 123 AND date = '2022-01-01';
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_type = 'Logged In' WHERE date = '2022-02-15' AND user_id = 456;
UPDATE user_activity_data SET duration_seconds = 300 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE website_traffic SET unique_visitors = 500, average_duration_seconds = 45.5 WHERE page_visited = 'Homepage';
UPDATE user_activity_data SET duration_seconds = 120 WHERE user_id = 101 AND page_visited = 'homepage';
UPDATE website_traffic SET total_visits = total_visits + 10, unique_visitors = unique_visitors + 1 WHERE page_visited = 'product_page';
UPDATE UserActivity SET time_spent = 60 WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE UserFeedback SET feedback_text = 'Great service!' WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE UserActivity SET time_spent = 60, page_visited = 'Page1' WHERE user_id = 101
UPDATE UserPreferences SET favorite_category = 'Technology', notification_enabled = true WHERE user_id = 202
